text: Adam Silver (born April 25, 1962) is an American lawyer and businessman. He is the current commissioner of the National Basketball Association (NBA). He has held this position since February 1, 2014. Silver has been married to his wife, Maggie, since 2015. They have two daughters. ==References== ==Other websites== * NBA.com Profile Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:NBA commissioners Category:People from Rye, New York he loves lebron
title: Adam Silver
